comments:
Description:
NPE when double click table in Edit Data Set window

Steps to reprdoce:
1. New a data source.
2. New a data set, set cursor after from, double click OFFICES table in Available Items list

Expected result:
Table is appeared after "from" in query text

Actual result:
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.data.oda.jdbc.ui.editors.SQLDataSetEditorPage.populateEventData(SQLDataSetEditorPage.java:1470)

	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:2968)
	at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.runEventLoop(Window.java:820)

This is a know bug introduced by a fixing to Drag&Drop operation bug in Mac. 

It should have been fixed in latest codes.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 153712 ***
